'''Radiant Spincrystal 15''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Time to Say Farewell]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to the shrine in front of [[Toda]] in [[Kamisato Estate]].
